attributes.action: Call a general election in which all current MP’s are barred from standing.
attributes.additional_details:
Career Politicians are bed blocking safe constituency seats, effectively stifling new ideas and debate. 
It is time to drain the Westminster swamp and open up all constituencies to new candidates.
attributes.background: MP’s of all political parties have shown their incompetence and arrogance in the failure to deliver the mandate voted for by the British people in the 2016 referendum. Democracy has been diminished, trust has been lost. The public are not represented.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its not the Government or Parliament's responsibility to bar individuals from standing for election. 

You could start a new petition calling for term limits for MPs, if that's something you'd like to see happen. 

You might also like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
